name: eags-extended-widgets
description: A collection of cool widgets made using AGS

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run tsc-alias
scripts.tsc-alias: npx tsc scripts/replacer.ts --module commonjs --target es2017 && npx tsc-alias
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx tsc-watch --onSuccess "npx nodemon"

author: eyezah
